summary.title: Java 25 Runtime Now in Preview
summary.summary: We are excited to announce that Java 25 runtime is now available in preview. This update provides enhanced features and performance for your applications.

2025-10-07.content: Cloud Run functions (1st gen) supports the [Node.js 22 runtime](https://docs.cloud.google.com/functions/docs/runtime-support#node.js) at the [General Availability release level](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Node.js 22 runtime now available
summary.summary: The Node.js 22 runtime is now generally available for Cloud Run (1st gen) functions.

2025-10-01.content: Cloud Run functions now provides an [upgrade tool](https://docs.cloud.google.com/functions/1stgendocs/migrating/upgrade-gen1-functions) for upgrading 1st gen functions to Cloud Run. This feature is in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Upgrade tool for 1st gen Cloud Functions
summary.summary: A new upgrade tool is available to help you migrate your 1st gen Cloud Functions to Cloud Run. This feature is currently in Preview.

summary.title: Go 1.24 Support
summary.summary: Go 1.24 runtime is now generally available.

2025-07-30.content: Support for [Go 1.25 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/concepts/execution-environment#go) is in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages). This runtime is available for early testers using existing [release candidates](https://go.dev/dl/#unstable).

summary.title: Go 1.25 Runtime Now Available
summary.summary: Go 1.25 runtime now in preview. Available for early testers.

2025-07-30.content: Support for [Node.js 24 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/concepts/execution-environment#node.js) is in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages). Node.js 24 is in the Current release state and enters long-term support (LTS) in October 2025. For more information, see [Node.js v24.0.0 (Current)](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/release/v24.0.0) in the Node.js website.

summary.title: Preview: Node.js 24 runtime
summary.summary: Node.js 24 runtime now available in preview.

summary.title: Go 1.24 Runtime Now in Preview
summary.summary: The Go 1.24 runtime is now available in preview for Google Cloud Functions, offering enhanced features and performance.

2025-06-17.content: Support for the [Ruby 3.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/concepts/execution-environment#ruby) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Ruby 3.4 runtime now available
summary.summary: Ruby 3.4 runtime is now generally available. This update enhances the capabilities and performance of your applications running on our platform.

2025-06-17.content: Support for the [PHP 8.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/concepts/execution-environment#php) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: PHP 8.4 runtime now available
summary.summary: PHP 8.4 runtime is now generally available. This update provides the latest features and improvements for your PHP applications.

2025-05-30.content:
For Java functions that use `functions-framework` version 1.4.0 or later, you
can now use the logging class `java.util.logging.Logger` to add a [unique execution
ID](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/runtimes/java#execution_id) to log outputs.

summary.title: Java logging enhancement
summary.summary: You can now add a unique execution ID to your Java function logs using `java.util.logging.Logger` if you're using functions-framework version 1.4.0 or later. This helps in tracking individual request executions.
